website_summaries.verdict: A popular system. Customers love the features, the price, and the fact that no contract is required. The best on today's market.
pros: Customizable add-on features (like carbon monoxide detection)
Wireless emergency signal is nearly impossible to block
Easy to set up and use
cons: External siren is not standard, but an add-on is available for purchase

customer_reviews.title: Simplisafe is the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: Just got the product (2018 edition) about a week ago. Hooked everything up, had to call their customer service group a few times for clarification on a couple of questions. Got great service, polite, helpful, professional. Highly recommend this system (the latest version) to anyone looking for a self-installed home system.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Great, simple product but check the box closely!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product but I would buy it directly from Simplisafe in lieu of Amazon. Not all items were included and while the recourse to return and reorder was offered I have already installed the system at a remote property. Will most likely not be able to resolve this to my satisfaction. Should have checked the box in the box before driving 4-1/2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Will not work without wifi although they do not state so in their literature
customer_reviews.text: When I contacted simplisafe to explain that the location in which I was installing the system did not have wifi,which was required for the camera included in the package, they said it so many words that it was my problem and not theirs, this despite the fact that it was advertised as a stand alone system. Very deceptive advertising.
customer_reviews.author: rschris

customer_reviews.title: SimpliSafe: research what you're buying!
customer_reviews.text: After installing the SimpliSafe system, I discovered that emergency services would not be dispatched unless the emergency could be verified. Unless you purchased a system w/a camera or listening mic, there's no way to verify the emergency w/o extra expense. Additionally, their monitoring service is required ($25/month) so you can connect w/your system via their app, or your smart phone. In summary, the system is useless unless you're at home. I should've done more research on this product before I purchased it and SimpliSafe needs to be more forthcoming on their tv & radio commercials. I have no problem with Amazon what so ever, but I thought. Amazon customers should know these facts about SimpliSafe.
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly poor phone support
customer_reviews.text: Physical product is fine but phone support is virtually non-existent. 35 and 45 minutes waits on two separate occasions. I purchased a smoke detector to pair with the Simplisafe alarm system and found it impossible to know whether it was paired, would trigger a fire department response, etc. We will see if they contact me by email, but so far I'm disappointed with customer service.
customer_reviews.author: nodoubt

customer_reviews.title: Update . Several good and expedient calls to CSR
customer_reviews.text: Recently caked . Much better experiences . No longer 1 Star . 4 stars is warranted ..
customer_reviews.author: Grunk

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 12 piece and was missing the key fob, 1 entry sensor and panic. Oh, but I did a yard sign. Ha. Returning the product
customer_reviews.author: Tatum

customer_reviews.title: My home is protected.
customer_reviews.text: Simplisafe is very easy to set up. My Son set it up in about 20 minutes. It works great and has a nice clear picture, easy to arm and unarm. The only thing I was disapointed in was it will not concet to my phone. I have an older smart phone android. It coneccted to my sons new android phone and to my daughter-in-laws iPhone just fine. It is a good thing they live with me. I guess I will have to buy a new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes but was seriously let down.
customer_reviews.text: Batteries were dead in held of devices, one motion detector doesn’t work, and ad was misleading about working with Alexa. Only works if you use their service! Would be nice to hear door chimes on echos in other parts of home rather than just base. If you want all the fancy features you pretty much forced to purchase their monitoring. And yes hacks online are real, I was able to disable the sensors rather easily.
customer_reviews.author: jabate09

customer_reviews.title: Additional monthly fee required even w/o monitoring
customer_reviews.text: The system appears to be easy to install and you can add additional sensors (and types of sensors) at a later time. However, even if you want to monitor the system yourself, you will have to pay a monthly fee to use the app/online tools - which is the ONLY way to be notified of a system trip (motion, glass break, smoke, anything). Without access to the app, this essentially becomes a very expensive door alert/noise maker - which similar products can be purchased for much less. While the fee is lower than other companies, this fact appears to be intentionally omitted from both the product description and from their website.
customer_reviews.author: Snowduck

customer_reviews.title: SCARY!!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY IMPRESSED!! I WAS SO SCARED LAST NIGHT...MY ALARM WENT OFF AT 1:25 A.M... THEN MY SIMPLISAFE BASE SAID IT WAS THE " BACKDOOR ALARM SENSOR " I GRABBED MY MACHETE AND TOLD MY GERMAN SHEPARD TO GET EM'!! I FOLLOWED HER IN THE LAUNDRY ROOM AND SAW THAT THE SENSOR HAD DETACHED FROM THE DOOR...WHEW!!! IT WAS A FALSE ALARM... I SECURED THE OTHER SENSORS AND WENT BACK TO BED... THANK YOU SIMPLISAFE... IT'S NICE TO KNOW THAT IT WORKS!! IT WAS A SCARY TEST BUT I'M GLAD IT HAPPENED!!! I PUT A SIMPLISAFE CAMERA IN MY HOUSE SO I KNOW WHEN ( NOT ) TO LEAVE MY BEDROOM!!😆
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Piton

customer_reviews.title: Terrible system unless you pay monthly
customer_reviews.text: its a dumb box that doesnt do anything if you are not paying... NOT WORTH IT!! do not buy!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AlexCabello

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: Love this system! Everyone talking about non exsitant customer support, but I’ve called em twice now and both time was on hold for less than a minute to be connected to helpful ppl speaking English perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simplisafe is an awesome security system.
customer_reviews.text: A do it yourself kit. Literally installs in minutes (depending on how many windows and doors you include). Fast response service center. You can't beat the price and no contracts. Arms/disarms in seconds. I love the camera. Can view my home from anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: reinaldo figueroa

customer_reviews.title: important to note!!!
customer_reviews.text: if you have a warranty issue and do NOT subscribe to monthly monitoring; Simplisafe will NOT replace or repair defective devices - even if brand new!!! you'll get stuck battling Amazon to replace the defective items!!! their 100% guaranty is only if you purchase directly form them!!! So while the prices for these packages are fabulous, you coud end up like me and having to spend another $87 for a replacement keypad that was delivered 33 days ago but activated less than 48 hours ago!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate, in Louisville, KY

customer_reviews.title: Easy to ise
customer_reviews.text: I set this up in an apartment I was renting. Only negative is that the “sticky stuff” used to hold up the pieces release after 45 days or so on the bigger pieces
customer_reviews.author: JBM

customer_reviews.title: Cannot use app without monitoring
customer_reviews.text: So this is a very cool, easy to install system. I didn't really want 24/7 monitoring so this seemed like a good fit. The problem that made me return it is that without the monitoring you can't even use the pp on your phone to arm or disarm. That means that it is a glorified very expensive door chime. There are much better door chimes for much less money, sorry simplisafe but you were just not cool about this while thing. If I could have armed and disarmed and monitor on my phone I would have kept it..
customer_reviews.author: Dave Moses

customer_reviews.title: So easy to setup, just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Was considering an ADT Solution however we love the fact that SimpliSafe doesn't require a contract. I'm going to add additional devices to our home.
customer_reviews.author: Indiansfan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install, easy to use. Peace of mind for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I waited to install the Simplisafe system until two of my friends could help me. I am 75 and a little afraid of ladders at my age. My niece took over and had it all setup and working within a couple of hours. Turning alarm on and off is very easy and you have enough time to disarm it coming home. I just recently signed up for the monitoring and got set up with local law enforcement, all very easy and efficient. I am very pleased with the system and the people at Simplisafe.
customer_reviews.author: Green.Ice

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and use, great value!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my first-generation system, so I replaced it with this upgraded equipment -- mostly for the Alexa integration. I was disappointed it only activates the alarm in Home or Away modes -- it will not turn off the alarm. I understand the security concern, but it can easily be resolved by requiring a PIN -- just like my Chevy app does to remote start my vehicle. If it would do this, I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: WADE A CHESTNUT

customer_reviews.title: Stops working about once per month
customer_reviews.text: I have only owned this system for about 2 1/2 months and twice I have had to take it apart, remove batteries (reboot) and reassemble the base. This is what SimpliSafe tells customers they have to do. If their product frequently has to be taken apart, they should have designed it to come apart easily. I wish I had known what I was getting into, there must be systems that work longer than a month without having a problem necessitating disassembly. UPDATE: Rating lowered from 2 stars to 1. System stopped working entirely, "reboot" no longer solves problem.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tunes

customer_reviews.title: Outdated model
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and received. Seemed easy enough to set up BUT when I was trying to activate, found out from SimpliSafe that the $217 model I purchased from Amazon was OUTDATED and they have to send me something to make it work. The back of the base says 7-20-19. Tech support said that was outdated and they do not use anymore. BUT THEY SOLD IT TO ME ANYWAY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and setup but bad support.
customer_reviews.text: This SimpliSafe system seems to work fine. The system is easy to setup and activate for service online. The document is very poor written. Having problem setting up an iOS app. Couldn't find any document to support this. I called the support and was put on hold for 20 minutes, I finally give up and hung up. Decided to seek for help via email. Still no response from SimpliSafe after 4 days. Very disappointed for the support of the SimpliSafe.
customer_reviews.author: Hue H Tran

customer_reviews.title: The base did not work
customer_reviews.text: Hi we bought the Simplisafe system for our home, but the base station did not give off a signal so the home is still not being monitored. Simplisafe has mailed us a replacement but because we purchased on Amazon it is not the same and if we decided to sell our system the new base has no value and is black in color. I paid $200 for this set and am very disappointed. I can't even contact anyone to get a true replacement from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this from amazon
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this from amazon, get it straight from the company. Ordered this and it had to be replaced because all the sensors were giving off low battery the day I received. I got the replacement product and someone else’s old SIM card was in device and simply safe could not get it switched over without sending me a new SIM card. Needless to say I returned it to amazon and am going with another provider.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W

customer_reviews.title: Good system
customer_reviews.text: This is the second SimpliSafe alarm system I’ve purchased. This on has an added panic button which I like. I highly doubt I will ever needed it since I live in a very safe small town but it does give me peace of mind since I live alone. Tech support can be a little difficult but overall I’m happy with the system. I also purchased an additional camera for inside the home. My place is small so one is plenty. You can view it on your phone when away. That is a nice feature. The one I have now is an improvement over there original model.
customer_reviews.author: Globalgypsy

customer_reviews.title: Bought two, wish I could return.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the system, noticed several comments about increased monthly cost if you add on apps and camera. The problem I have is I watched a video by lockpickinglawyer. He went right through it.
customer_reviews.author: Wildnor

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Poor packaging. These pieces are tiny and fall out easy when the box ships. So far this easy install is a royal pain in my rear-

customer_reviews.title: It work one time

I have call tech support I get a different answers four out the five times I honestly think that the Reps hang up it happened more than once We ran through the resetting procedure many times still can't get it out of the home mode they finally agreed to send me another keypad I am waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Tape does not work- screws come packaged in tricky places!
customer_reviews.text: Installations n review only: As I suspected, the tape on the wall devices does not work. Plan to use your screwdriver. Screws are in tricky places so watch out for those - I almost tossed mine. And they’re SUPER small and not easy to work with. Will follow up with performance review.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to install I thought I had done something wrong and had a friend come over, check, and tell me, yes, it was all set. I am really glad I got SimpliSafe because it integrates so well, has battery back up, and really good WiFi
customer_reviews.author: QuintessentiallyYours

customer_reviews.title: Security affordability do it yourself
customer_reviews.text: Only had this a week, still adding pieces, ie more entrance sensors and waiting on a camera, I tried calling for tech support, was put on hold 8 minutes and hung up on. Didn’t appreciate that, so, 4 stars so far...?
customer_reviews.author: paul burkett

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Works for a couple weeks then does this. If you need a reliable system DON’T GET THIS ONE ! You have to take it apart to reset it and MAYBE it’ll work for a little while longer
customer_reviews.author: Martin DeLessio

customer_reviews.title: This system is the easiest to install.  The software is so good.
customer_reviews.text: Internet + cell communication, ease of installation, great after install support. I have installed security systems on my own properties about 10 times. This system is so easy to use, it is fabulous. the monitoring is certainly affordable. I love the fact that the wireless sensors identify themselves and can be added so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Infoman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in the security system. The devices literally keep falling off the doors! How safe is that?? I came to my alarm going off, because one device had fell off. This is not a good system and completely a waste of money! Also, to have the app and service is expensive! I wish I had sent it back! I will be investing in another system and trashing this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Device died in a little over 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my device on December 9th 2019. Last month I started getting messages that one of the motion sensors was not responding. The base station is now dead! I just emailed support and will update the outcome here. No response from Simplisafe support 5/5/20. I was able to get a hold of support and was walked through resetting and re-syncing the system. It worked for two weeks then stopped again. I reset it again and it worked for a few days. I will not buy Simplisafe products again.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Hardware installed in 30 minutes. Setup took a few minutes more, but was very easy. One door/window sensor was faulty, but replacement should be on the way from Simplisafe. This system replaced a hard wired system. It took me longer to dismantle the old system than to set up the Simplisafe system. I pay half of what I was paying to monitor the old system for Simplisafe. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: gmahler

customer_reviews.title: Pay for monthly service or don't bother
customer_reviews.text: App only works with monthly fee. Makes this no contract system pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I am not good with technology at all but this was so easy to install Literally took me thirty min to put around my house
customer_reviews.author: Katy_Weasley_143

customer_reviews.title: Two low batteries with new 9 piece device set:( & contract required for cell phone to be notified
customer_reviews.text: Ordered nine piece set and two of the devices had batteries low enough that the unit is telling me they need to be replaced. Also, your cell phone will not be notified of alarms unless you sign a monthly contract with this company
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Oesch

customer_reviews.title: If you want a good "Alarm" system where you don't have to pay a monthly fee
customer_reviews.text: then this is the one as long as you don't use their cameras. I have an Arlo for my video monitoring and this for my Alarm at night. Arlo does not require a monthy fee to see the cameras on line, while simply safe does. But with Arlo and Simply Safe I have the best of both worlds.
customer_reviews.author: G. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Really simple, great peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: This system was as easy to setup as they claim. It was fast, and it's really easy to manage from my mobile device. We signed up for the monitoring plan to add safety when we are all away from home. We also added a doorbell with video monitoring, which we find highly amusing--although the video doorbell is quite tricky to install and get on your network. Highly recommended, and when I purchased (March 2020) Amazon had the best price by far. $20 less than smallest bundle on the vendor's website and with more components.
customer_reviews.author: C. Campos

customer_reviews.title: Works without wifi.
customer_reviews.text: This system is installed in my summer house where there is no cable or wifi available. Setup was very easy and when I called the tech service to have the system tested, they found no problem registered the system and was good to go. Without wifi, I could not use a camera, but I don't find that as a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good function
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the functioning of the system. I subtracted a star because you have to pay for the most premium subscription to be able to arm your system from your phone, which I wasn’t aware of prior to purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ott

customer_reviews.title: Police and fire response is available for $15/month...
customer_reviews.text: Set up in my sister's house in less than an hour. For police and fire contact you need a $15/month monitor subscription. You can skip that but as my sister is alone, it is a good deal. You are not required to get the monitoring and the system warns you with the app.
customer_reviews.author: Systems Analyst @ Large

customer_reviews.title: Awesome System!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, I had to call Customer service twice, first time it took a while. My second call they answered within 2 mins! Great system that offers Google compatibility. I would recommend this to a friend. The extra remote siren works great at 150 ft away!
customer_reviews.author: Birdman's View

customer_reviews.title: Perfect security system
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother who is 82 years old and wanted a security system but did not want to pay the heavy monthly fees. I have one for myself so I knew it was a good product. Unfortunately she can’t turn a screwdriver but she learned the arming and disarming of the system in no time and feels much safer now.
customer_reviews.author: lawsc

customer_reviews.title: Purchase something else
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is over an hour wait to talk to someone once your a customer. Alarm just random goes off when it’s not set
customer_reviews.author: moe

customer_reviews.title: Great home security system
customer_reviews.text: System was easy to install and set up. Very user friendly. Had an issue with the base sim card and tech support shipped out a replacement the next day. Very good technical support.
customer_reviews.author: Dovetail75

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, small cost for full monitoring functions
customer_reviews.text: This system is my first alarm system, but it is versatile for anyone and easy to set up. Only had to call tech support once, and that’s because our little chiweenie triggered the motion detector before live monitoring started, so they had me flip it over (the motion detector, not the dog). With the upgraded monthly monitoring, I love remote arming and checking camera from the app. Notifies me when the kids arm it when they leave or disarm when they’re home from school. If they forget to arm it, I can. Camera (purchased separate but simple to add) seems clear, talk function worked, and events on system trigger a minute recording.
customer_reviews.author: circuitrider

customer_reviews.title: Great system!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Entry sensors Came with screws that could be used to attach to odd shaped door frames. Motion sensor also easily attached to the wall. System works well and has phone support available..
customer_reviews.author: diane greslick

customer_reviews.title: Feel safer with it.
customer_reviews.text: System works just as it should. Installation and set up was easy. My only complaint is the door/window alarms didn’t come with a sticky enough adhesive. My windows are mostly plastic so the magnets wouldn’t work, and the adhesive didn’t hold well enough so they kept falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Ted R.

customer_reviews.title: Was it my wifi or the system
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for about a week or so then I kept losing connection. Since I live in an apartment complex I don't know if my wifi was to blame, other interference or the project.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feel so much safer now
customer_reviews.text: This was much easier to install than I anticipated. I feel much safer at home, especially since I live alone. Love the app on my phone so I can literally see what’s happening in my home even from work. Gave it 4 stars because 2 of the entry sensors wouldn’t stick to the windows so I had to tape them on to get them to stay.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: No app to control unless you pay
customer_reviews.text: You can not self monitor with this system , im dissapointed no app to control via wifi unless you pay a monthly fee
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Cruz Puebla

customer_reviews.title: Great system when it working
customer_reviews.text: Had it from 6 months and it stop working Love the system when it was working. Now I can't it replaced or repaired from Amazon or simply safe
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Baker sr

customer_reviews.title: Simplisafe is simply the best
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I thought it was and exactly what I was looking for. We compared it to ADT and Vivant. The design is sleek and the installation could not have been any faster or easier. No wires and little required as far as instructions. Literally, we had the system up and running in less than an hour. We will be adding a couple of additional camera's and motion detectors but It's as turnkey as turnkey gets. I LOVE it. Plus there is no long term service contract.
customer_reviews.author: MurphDog

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Actually Include a Mobile App
customer_reviews.text: The description for this product is super misleading. Simplisafe requires that you pay for their most expensive monthly plan in order to be able to use the smart phone app. It's 2020, how is this not in the basic offering??? So if you are like me and don't care about monitoring, look elsewhere. Unless you want to leave home and have no clue what your system is doing at home, this isn't the system for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ribit man

customer_reviews.title: Camera not so great.
customer_reviews.text: This seems to work pretty good. My only complaint is the camera doesn't really work well if there is low light.
customer_reviews.author: mycatalina

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and add sensors. Took me about 20 minutes total to set it up. I’ve had other security systems before and this one is definitely worth every penny. The product itself is VERY well made and just a cheap hunk of plastic. The only thing I would change is making the siren louder, we have service connected to it so it’s not a huge deal but it’s not the loudest. I also like the chime is makes whenever a door is opened, it makes me feel better that the system is working and I’ll know if my toddler is opening a door.
customer_reviews.author: Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great security system.
customer_reviews.text: Love this setup! Super easy to install. Instructions are very thorough. The alarm is very loud. All in all a great product. Some parts to it are a little pricey, but that's expected when your protecting family.
customer_reviews.author: chasetie

customer_reviews.title: I'll pass
customer_reviews.text: I loved the interface with this product, very easy to use. Customer service is a joke. If you never need to talk to them, buy it. Otherwise, stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: great so far. could use some mire sticky tabs though. no extras in my set. also... not sure why they included a sign holder with no sign. oh well.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: The Name says it all
customer_reviews.text: They could not have named this better, simple is right. I unboxed it all, read the book, plugged in the base and the base and the remote walked me through set up. I can't see how this could be any easier to use and set up. Makes me wonder why I did not just buy this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product at a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product.... my only issue was the fact that it had been "misadvertised" to include a camera... Having said that, it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Clemente

customer_reviews.title: SimpliSafe - Simple and Safe 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: SimpliSafe is just that, simple and safe. Install was very intuitive and all devices are well thought-out. I highly recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product!
customer_reviews.text: Simplisafe was easy to install and works as intended. This is definitely a 5 star product! The only thing I am not thrilled with is that the $15 monthly monitoring fee they talk about on commercials does not include monitoring via the mobile app (which I think is a must have), so expect your bill to be $25 + taxes/fees.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with original system
customer_reviews.text: How can you possibly move forward with improving a product and not make it possible for your loyal purchasers to upgrade? This is a major investment for the average consumer. Figure it out!! I will go with a different supplier.

customer_reviews.title: Simple DIY SECURITY!

customer_reviews.text: Backup battery DOES not last 24 hours. lasts one hour at best

customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Stoker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome work
customer_reviews.text: Wow I didn’t think it was that good but it’s really what I like with the notifications and the alerts. Perfect. Look forward to adding additional product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Medina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Alarm System Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: The SimpliSafe alarm was extremely easy to set up and very customizable. The Alarm System definitely does exactly what it’s suppose to do, Protect My Family...
customer_reviews.author: Mark P

customer_reviews.title: its simple
customer_reviews.text: love this product. hope the price of cameras on the security package comes down at some point. but peace of mind for long vacations.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good alarm system
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplicity in design and easy installation. However, the app and web site are not easy to use and not clear on charges and how it works.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and program
customer_reviews.text: I have not called tech support but it keeps telling me I have a door fault but all the doors chime when I open them. Otherwise it would be 5 stars Its been a few months and the problem above fixed itself... Works very well

Backups for your backups. 24 hour battery and dual WiFI & cellular connections to keep your home secure and protected from the unexpected.
